snippet: Philip M. Darivoff, a recently retired Goldman Sachs partner, has been appointed chairman of DFG Investment Advisers, an asset management firm in New York.
abstract: Philip M. Darivoff, a recently retired Goldman Sachs partner, has been appointed chairman of DFG Investment Advisers, an asset management firm in New York.

headline.main: Former Goldman Partner Darivoff Named Chairman of DFG
